import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; const FormStep1 = (props) => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ first_name: "", last_name: "", email: "", phone: "" }); let name, value; const handleInput = (e) => { console.log(e) name = e.target.name value = e.target.value setForm({ ...form, [name]: value }) } const postData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const { first_name, last_name , email , phone} = form }; return ( <>




) } export default FormStep1
